items.name: Chicken Curry
items.description: Chicken Curry is one of my favorite chicken dishes. I have always liked how yummy it tasted and enjoy its rich and thick sauce.

items.name: Sous Vide Chicken Adobo
items.description: Sous Vide Chicken Adobo is a version of Filipino Chicken adobo cooked using the Sous Vide method, which involves cooking food in lower (but precise) temperature.

items.name: Afritadang Baboy
items.description: Afritadang Baboy is a Filipino pork stew with potato and carrots.

items.name: Pinoy Pork Menudo
items.description: Menudo with ham is a special pork menudo version wherein ham, raisins, and bell peppers were added.
